Package org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild

Contains classes of the Javabuild plugin.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JkJavaPacker.JkExtraPacking JkExtraPacking action that will be processed by the JkJavaBuild.pack method.
 

Class Summary
JkJavaBuild Template class to define build on Java project.
JkJavaBuild.JkManifestOption Options about producing the manifest.
JkJavaBuild.JkOptionExtaPath Options about extra path
JkJavaBuild.JkOptionPack Options about archive packaging.
JkJavaBuild.JkOptionTest Options about tests
JkJavaBuild.JkPublishOptions Options about publications.
JkJavaBuildPlugin Class to extend to create plugin for JkJavaBuild.
JkJavaPacker Jar maker for the JkJavaBuild template.
JkJavaPacker.Builder A builder for JkJavaPacker
 

Package org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild Description

Contains classes of the Javabuild plugin.

Java Build plugin is an extension of the core build framework providing classes to build Java project as Java build template or tool for running unit test, handling manifest, creating jar and so on.
